document_data.mainbody:
Gingrid was a strange follower of Myrkul who lived in the Underchasm in 1486 DR.
Gingrid resided in a castle in Underchasm, just above the earth primordial Grumbars temple, waiting for a sign from her presumed-lost god. In 1486 DR, she met a group of Chosen Arietta Seasilver, follower of Siamorphe Malik el Sami, follower of Cyric Joelle Emmeline, follower of Sune and Kleef Kenric, paladin follower of the dead god Helm. Gingrid helped them, telling them how to get down to the temple.
